Installing VirtualBox Image
=================================



Environment information
-----------------------
The current version of the instance (OppiaMobile Server 0.1.39) is running:

* Ubuntu 12.04 LTS Desktop
* Apache 2
* Mysql 5.5
* Django 1.6.1
* TastyPie 0.11.0
* South 0.8.4
* OppiaServer 0.1.39
